title: Delhi govt plans collaboration with IIT Kanpur for AI-driven air pollution control
description: The Delhi government is intensifying its battle against air pollution through a year-round, technology-focused strategy and is considering a collaboration with IIT Kanpur to leverage Artificial Intelligence (AI) and data-driven solutions.
content:

title: SoftBank Group to acquire data center investor DigitalBridge for $4 billion
description: SoftBank Group Corp said Monday it will acquire U.S. data center investment company DigitalBridge Group Inc for roughly $4 billion to beef up its ability to build and finance infrastructure for new artificial intelligence services. SoftBank will indirectly acquire all the outstanding DigitalBridge common stock for $16 per share, with…
content:

title: Wedding Officiant Repeatedly Mistakes Groom's Name for Bride's Ex-Husband
description: A Reddit user recounted the time a wedding officiant repeatedly mistook the groom's name for the bride's ex-husband and allegedly wrote their script using artificial intelligence, leading to frustration among the bride, groom, and their guests.
content:
A wedding ceremony quickly turned awkward when the officiant repeatedly used the bride's ex-husband's name for the groom.
